Content.Text:
<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So what can I do for you today?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, pick what you want to buy.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gotcha!
Pick four fish from your bag!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, those are good ones.
I'll mix up some bait right now.
Give me a second.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh-ho, welcome to the <GREEN>Bait Shop</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, know what, <MYNAME>?
I haven't told you about bait yet!
<PAGE>
The way it works is you bring in <RED>4 fish</RED>
and I mix them up into fishing bait!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Of course there's a tiny little
fee for my time and trouble, but still,
it's cheap!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Get bait made and you'll find the
fishing gets much easier!
You'll be wanting a lot of it!

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa now, <MYNAME>!
There's no room in your bag!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Where are you gonna put this
bait I made for you? Make some space in
your bag before you come, okay?
